2e0e8997-f0f0-42ab-8dd9-ff2dbb5c1d1d.name: 仆从
2e0e8997-f0f0-42ab-8dd9-ff2dbb5c1d1d.notes: IQ 为 0 或者有奴性

378e57ad-4bb7-4910-90e6-8fbe6f84ccdf.name: 感同身受
378e57ad-4bb7-4910-90e6-8fbe6f84ccdf.notes: 一方的死亡将直接把另一方的 HP 降为 0

078981ad-0bc0-4124-9c10-0aa1d220e9f2.name: 感同身受
078981ad-0bc0-4124-9c10-0aa1d220e9f2.notes: 一方的死亡将直接把另一方的 HP 降为 0，但是损伤仅影响盟友不影响你

6efeee21-a092-4bbb-95ab-12802c6342ac.name: 感同身受
6efeee21-a092-4bbb-95ab-12802c6342ac.notes: 一方死亡时另一方也会自动死亡

ca422583-062f-44f9-822f-70b911e404b4.name: 感同身受
ca422583-062f-44f9-822f-70b911e404b4.notes: 一方死亡时另一方也会自动死亡，但是损伤仅影响盟友不影响你

04e20e55-be21-43d7-93fe-e9668bd3e92e.name: 特化
04e20e55-be21-43d7-93fe-e9668bd3e92e.notes: @一 纲生物（如“哺乳类”或“鸟类”）@

52144936-33ff-4b7f-8b03-a5679f7a0da3.name: 特化
52144936-33ff-4b7f-8b03-a5679f7a0da3.notes: @一科生物（如“猫科动物”或“鹦鹉科动物”）@

983d59ba-6e5a-4c59-b80f-88a367b592fa.name: 特化
983d59ba-6e5a-4c59-b80f-88a367b592fa.notes: @一种生物（如“家猫”或“金刚鹦鹉”）@

0e5aebeb-4340-4efe-bc43-1aad744ecb54.name: 战斗反射
0e5aebeb-4340-4efe-bc43-1aad744ecb54.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

36517eb1-0ac6-49f9-876c-5159cdf56308.name: 健康
36517eb1-0ac6-49f9-876c-5159cdf56308.notes: +1 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

2327ca15-df61-4fa7-a761-750aa9b05b16.name: Fit, Very
2327ca15-df61-4fa7-a761-750aa9b05b16.notes: +2 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate; lose FP at half the normal rate (in both cases, not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

22fb8fe5-48bb-4e13-9c16-43270593045e.name: 幸运
22fb8fe5-48bb-4e13-9c16-43270593045e.notes: 游戏的每个小时可用一次

cc3960be-819c-4e43-bdac-0e8874c939e7.name: @罕见：加速度，高原反应，潜水病，晕船，或是太空病等@

d7bf7d91-f3f6-4797-86cc-12870be2006e.name: @罕见：加速度，高原反应，潜水病，晕船，或是太空病等@

fe08a1c6-c03b-468c-a352-803fac58d3d0.name: @罕见：加速度，高原反应，潜水病，晕船，或是太空病等@

89cf5bce-6c8a-44dc-91b6-2eb3e2f8a80b.name: Weapon Bond
89cf5bce-6c8a-44dc-91b6-2eb3e2f8a80b.notes: You own a Weapon that is uniquely suited to you.

f36c36cf-9800-4e09-9402-2b8496883a31.name: 高痛阈
f36c36cf-9800-4e09-9402-2b8496883a31.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture

52259994-1e45-487d-8b9b-08edd5c2ac18.name: 有残缺
52259994-1e45-487d-8b9b-08edd5c2ac18.notes: 仅适用于变形。有缺陷与变更容貌是互斥的。

cb9fcdbf-4276-4018-906c-362052f71e2f.name: 需要样本
cb9fcdbf-4276-4018-906c-362052f71e2f.notes: 仅适用于变形。你必须触摸目标。

aed147da-abc3-44ab-a130-6c67ad6fa7eb.name: 需要样本
aed147da-abc3-44ab-a130-6c67ad6fa7eb.notes: 仅适用于变形。你需要来自目标的一滴血，一缕头发等等。

679d5b78-b2d7-4e4d-a1ff-858392560d8c.name: 需要样本
679d5b78-b2d7-4e4d-a1ff-858392560d8c.notes: 仅适用于变形。你必须吞噬整个目标。

7d3f2f49-c805-49c4-9a81-9175cf165d54.name: 社会污名（少数群体）
7d3f2f49-c805-49c4-9a81-9175cf165d54.notes: -2 Reaction from others; +2 Reaction in own group

4a2f5b05-8122-45b2-b5e8-0c46bac9007f.name: Rage Casting
4a2f5b05-8122-45b2-b5e8-0c46bac9007f.notes: Spell can only have the caster as the subject and is limited as if by the wrath PM.
